text: Phoenix () is a small and not-so-bright constellation in the southern sky. It is one of the birds in a "nest" of bird constellations near it. This constellation was named after the mythical phoenix. == Mythology == This constellation represents a mythological bird that burns itself up every several hundred years then comes back alive from the ashes of the fire == Other websites == * The Deep Photographic Guide to the Constellations: Phoenix Category:Constellations
title: Phoenix (constellation)
